/**
 *  ICU <specials> source: <path>/xml/main/si.xml
 *  Chrome Note: This locale data is abridged to contain categories
 *  actually used by Chrome.
 */
si{
    AuxExemplarCharacters{"[\u200B-\u200D ඎ-ඐ ඦ ෳ]"}
    ExemplarCharacters{"[අ-ඍ එ-ඖ ං ඃ ක-ඣ ඥ ඤ ට-න ඳ-ර ල ව-ෆ ා-\u0DD4 \u0DD6 ෘ ෲ ෟ ෙ-ෞ \u0DCA]"}
    Languages{
        si{"සිංහල"}
    }
    LocaleScript{
        "Sinh",
    }
    Version{"1.7"}
}
